gameDetails.name: Carcassonne: Little Buildings
gameDetails.description: Carcassonne: Little Buildings is a promotional expansion released with SpielBox magazine issue 5/2012.  The expansion consists of 18 building tokens: 6 houses, 6 sheds, and 6 towers. Each player gets an equal number of these tokens at the beginning of the game to place on a tile in place of a meeple.  When a road, city, cloister, or field is scored, it receives 1 additional point for each tile that is shared with a "Little Building". A variant is included where the sheds/houses/towers are treated differently and score 1/2/3 additional point(s) when the structures are completed. Part of the Carcassonne series.
